name: live-cache-workspace
description: A client-side cache + controller library for stateful resources

scripts.build: cd library/core && bun run build && cd ../invalidator && bun run build && cd ../storage-manager && bun run build && cd ../react && bun run build
scripts.publish:packages: bun run build && npm --workspace library/core publish && npm --workspace library/invalidator publish && npm --workspace library/storage-manager publish && npm --workspace library/react publish
scripts.test:ci: bun run build && bun test test/
